title: Can we please fix Karthus already ? (VO Bug)
body:
As you may know Riot, Karthus has gone completely silent (VO not working, he doesnt talk in-game) for more than a week now. Now I know he is nowhere as popular as {{champion:64}} but that doesn't mean he'll have to wait till the next patch in order to get fixed. I feel discouraged to pick my beloved karthus just because of this issue.

When can we expect a fix for this ?

replies.body:
Hey iBruSwain - 

We did try to hotfix this issue earlier in the patch, however, the fix didn't stick. D: We're working to get it fixed for 6.3.
